text: (pirimi vuvada, kantavan vuvada) obagen yamkisivekutat jivana sahakaruveku nositiyahot ovunta vivaha kara denu. (esema jivana sahakaruvan nÃ¦ti) obage vahalungen vu honda ayatada vivaha kara denu. ovun duppatun vuvada, allah tamange dayava magin ovunva pohosatun bavata pat karanu Ã¦ta. (danamana kirimehi) allah itamat vasalavantayeku ha (minisunge tatvaya) hondin danneku vasayen sitinneya
